import { Container } from '../../style'; const TeacherApplicationSampleClassGuidelines = () => { return (

Once you have signed up on our Tagpros website, you will be required to submit a teacher application that will ask for your experience and details as a teacher. A part of this is submitting a sample class where you are teaching about any topics for more or less 5 minutes.

 

Guidelines for your profile video

  • Required: 4-6 minutes long
  • Clearly show your face for at least part of the video
  • Speak clearly and in an engaging manner
  • Good lighting
  • No background noise

 

You can easily create a professional, high-quality video using your computer or smartphone. Record directly using Tagprosâ€™s recording feature, or record separately and upload to Tagpros. Our technology supports video uploads of up to 100MB. If your file is larger than this, you will need to compress it in order to upload it to Tagpros.

); }; export default TeacherApplicationSampleClassGuidelines;
